english.segment1: He became sin. Who knew no sin. That we might become His Righteousness. He humbled himself and carried the cross
english.segment2: Love so amazing. Love so amazing
english.segment3: Chorus: Jesus Messiah. Name above all names. Blessed Redeemer. Emmanuel. The rescue for sinners. The ransom from Heaven. Jesus Messiah. Lord of all
english.segment4: His body the bread. His blood the wine. Broken and poured out all for love. The whole earth trembled. And the veil was torn
english.segment5: Love so amazing. Love so amazing, yeah
english.segment6: Chorus: Jesus Messiah. Name above all names. Blessed Redeemer. Emmanuel. The rescue for sinners. The ransom from Heaven. Jesus Messiah. Lord of all
english.segment7: All our hope is in You. All our hope is in You. All the glory to You, God. The light of the world
english.segment8: Chorus: Jesus Messiah. Name above all names. Blessed Redeemer. Emmanuel. The rescue for sinners. The ransom from Heaven. Jesus Messiah. Lord of all
